content.raw:
GDAL support is currently disabled in the homebrew formulae due to [an issue](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/1063/build-problem-with-gdal-on-osx) that has only recently been addressed in the default branch by [gazebo pull request 1388](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1388/fix-for-properly-including-gdal-headers-on). I'll try to backport that fix to gazebo4 and gazebo5, and I'll update this tutorial at that time.

I'm not sure if we need to mention os x support in this tutorial or not. I'll be updating it soon anyway.
content.html:
GDAL support is currently disabled in the homebrew formulae due to an issue that has only recently been addressed in the default branch by gazebo pull request 1388. I'll try to backport that fix to gazebo4 and gazebo5, and I'll update this tutorial at that time.

I'm not sure if we need to mention os x support in this tutorial or not. I'll be updating it soon anyway.
